response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product offers unparalleled capabilities and benefits that could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and features, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15,000. We believe this is a fantastic opportunity for you to experience the superior quality and functionality of our product while also securing a significant savings compared to the market rate. Please let us know if you have any questions or would like to proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 15000}
